jobDescription: Hi, we’re Second Genome. We are a fast-paced and innovative venture-backed biotechnology company developing tomorrow’s breakthrough therapeutics at the interface of complex microbial communities and their host environments. We are leaders in microbial ecology, metagenomics, and computer science. We love fresh approaches, we value process validation, and we welcome peer review. And we’re looking for a Business and Operations Intern. We’re on the search for a self-starter with a passion for commercial operations including sales, marketing, and client project management. We’d love to work with someone who is personally driven and comfortable in a fast-paced work environment; resourceful when working toward goals; accepting of the changing demands of a startup company, and a natural multi-tasker. We deeply value team players who understand the importance of communication and the balance between compromise and assertion. Responsibilities and DutiesCreate and maintain online Project Management workflow in project management software.Provide project status updates and align cross functional teams for delivery of profiling projects to clients.Build and launch email marketing campaign to promote profiling services.Follow up and track sales leads from the campaign.Qualifications and SkillsStrong academic achievements, particularly in sciences and business.Proven ability to multi-task and take on several projects simultaneously.A go-getter that can work with a cross-functional team.A strong curiosity to learn in a fast-paced corporate environment.A good communicator who can clearly articulate their ideas – verbally and in writing .Proficient in MS Office applications.Bonus QualificationsSales and Marketing experience a plusProject management experience a plusWhat’s it like to intern at Second Genome? In addition to our ground-breaking technology, we believe in embodying an authentically joyful workplace. Our Core Values: We are InnovatorsWe are Driven to ActionWe are Great ColleaguesWe Work SmartWe Respect the Data We understand and appreciate the hard work and emotional investment on the part of all our team members - it takes a lot to be a contributor at a startup that’s leading its industry. We make it a priority to mindfully design our work environment and employee offerings with our unique and dedicated team in mind. Fully stocked kitchen with sandwich materials, organic snacks, coffee (Peet’s or Stumptown - take your pick!) and beverages.Our WellBiome health and wellness program: open standing desks, and weekly boot camp and yoga classes on-site.Apple computer + all its fancy accessoriesFriendly and open office environment with great colleagues and an intentional culture that drives innovation, passion, collaboration, and fun!A picture is worth a thousand words.
